heading: Expatriate motion picture producers and directors.
alt-heading: Exiled motion picture producers and directors.
general-note: Here are entered works on expatriate motion picture producers and directors in general and, with local subdivision, works on expatriate motion picture producers and directors in a particular place. For the latter, an additional heading of the type Motion picture producers and directors--[place of origin] is assigned, e.g.. 1. Expatriate motion picture producers and directors--United States.  2. Motion picture producers and directors--Germany..
